column1: Funeral services will be at 10:30 a.m. Wednesday
column3: 2015 at St. John Lutheran Church in Alma. Visitation will be Tuesday
column5: 2015 from 5:00-8:00 p.m. at the Stewart Funeral Home of Wamego. The family will also accept friends the day of the funeral from 9:30 a.m. until the time of service at the church. Burial will be at the Wamego City Cemetery at 2:00 p.m.
